content.raw:
Yeah, they should probably work independently since they are getting started examples.

Also, there should probably be an add_subdirectory() and some unit test calls to the examples somewhere in the main build scripts to make sure they don't break in the future :-)
content.html:
Yeah, they should probably work independently since they are getting started examples.

Also, there should probably be an add_subdirectory() and some unit test calls to the examples somewhere in the main build scripts to make sure they don't break in the future :-)
